Buckconfig File
  BcfgSectionImpl(SECTION)
    PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# First section is ok')
    BcfgSectionHeaderImpl(SECTION_HEADER)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.[)('[')
      BcfgSectionNameImpl(SECTION_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.SECTION_NAME_FRAGMENT)('a')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.])(']')
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('b')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN)('=')
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_VALUE_FRAGMENT)('c')
  BcfgSectionImpl(SECTION)
    PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# Malformed section: no terminating ']'')
    BcfgSectionHeaderImpl(SECTION_HEADER)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.[)('[')
      BcfgSectionNameImpl(SECTION_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.SECTION_NAME_FRAGMENT)('d')
      PsiErrorElement:BcfgTokenType.SECTION_NAME_FRAGMENT or BcfgTokenType.] expected, got 'e'
        <empty list>
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('e')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN)('=')
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_VALUE_FRAGMENT)('f')
  BcfgSectionImpl(SECTION)
    PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# Malformed properties')
    BcfgSectionHeaderImpl(SECTION_HEADER)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.[)('[')
      BcfgSectionNameImpl(SECTION_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.SECTION_NAME_FRAGMENT)('g')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.])(']')
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# Empty values are ok')
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('h')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN)('=')
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        <empty list>
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# Even if they use line continuations')
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('i')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN)('=')
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        <empty list>
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# But missing an '=' is not ok')
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('j')
      PsiErrorElement:BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN or BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT expected
        <empty list>
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        <empty list>
  BcfgSectionImpl(SECTION)
    PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.COMMENT)('# File ends on a non-terminated, malformed property')
    BcfgSectionHeaderImpl(SECTION_HEADER)
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.[)('[')
      BcfgSectionNameImpl(SECTION_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.SECTION_NAME_FRAGMENT)('k')
      PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.])(']')
    BcfgPropertyImpl(PROPERTY)
      BcfgPropertyNameImpl(PROPERTY_NAME)
        PsiElement(BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT)('l')
      PsiErrorElement:BcfgTokenType.ASSIGN or BcfgTokenType.PROPERTY_NAME_FRAGMENT expected
        <empty list>
      BcfgPropertyValueImpl(PROPERTY_VALUE)
        <empty list>
